snippet.title: Nightmare Park on the 16K ZX81 from P.S.S. (1982)
snippet.description:
Nightmare Park was published by Personal Software Services
 in 1982

Created by Personal Software Services (P.S.S.)

Nightmare Park can be found in Paul Farrow's Software Archive here - http://www.fruitcake.plus.com/Sinclair/ZX81/Archive/PersonalSoftwareServices.htm

If you want to fuel my retrogaming habit go here - www.ko-fi.com/villordsutch

If you don't have a ZX81 but would like to play Nightmare Park then download EightyOne here - https://sourceforge.net/projects/eightyone-sinclair-emulator/

Please like and subscribe if you haven't already - Thanks 

You can also find me here - 

Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/Villordsutch

#ZX81 #Retrogaming
